name: One Time Offer (OTO) "Need Help / Coaching / Done For You Service" Script

fields.fieldTitle: What is the name of what they just bought?:

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: done-for-you "Desktop Ad Wizard" software, Click Funnels, 7 Day Ebook, etc.

fields.fieldTitle: What's the big payoff / big idea of what they just bought?

fieldHint.hint2: "What you just bought will help you _______."

fieldHint.hint3: Ex: drive more traffic and make more sales without hiring expensive copywriters or struggling to write the ads yourself; create money-making funnels quickly and easily without an expensive webmaster; write and publish an outrageously profitable ebook fast

fields.fieldTitle: What does that big payoff of what they bought mean to them?

fieldHint.hint2: "This means you will be able to _______."

fieldHint.hint3: Ex: get a lot more traffic and clicks to your website than ever before; set up money making pages a whole lot faster; get a lot more credibility as a published author and expert

fields.fieldTitle: Name of the coaching/done-for-you service you want them to buy:

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: Ad Writing Coaching; Funnel Setup Service; Kindle Book Writing Service

fields.fieldTitle: What does this OTO coaching/service help do that they need?

fieldHint.hint2: "This will help you _______ a lot faster and easier."

fieldHint.hint3: Ex: create really great ads fast to drive a bunch of targeted traffic to your website; Set up all the pages of your funnel; write your Kindle books and get them ready to sell on Amazon

fields.fieldTitle: Big payoff of this OTO coaching/service that really appeals:

fieldHint.hint3: Ex: attract a ton of new buyers to your website; professionally design your new sales funnels to make more sales; publish and sell a lot more books quickly

fields.fieldTitle: What does this big payoff mean to your target audience?

fieldHint.hint3: Ex: create compelling, custom, high-converting ads fast; create all the funnels you want any time you want without lifting a finger; create and publish as many books, reports and other document ideas as you want

fields.fieldTitle: Timeframe will this OTO coaching/service deliver results?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: about 60 minutes; an afternoon; less than a week; less than a month; one training cycle; by the end of the class

fields.fieldTitle: What is the regular price of this OTO coaching / service?
What is the special price of this OTO coaching / service?
#1 Result this OTO coaching/service gives your audience?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: I'll help you create dozens of unique totally customized ads with just a few mouse clicks; We will use Proven funnels that work no matter what you sell; We will write and so you can concentrate on what you do best, coming up with cool ideas for content

fields.fieldTitle: #2 Result this OTO coaching/service gives your audience?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: I'll help you use these ads to drive tons of traffic; We will legally STEAL your competitors' best funnel designs; We will automatically create and format your books for you

fields.fieldTitle: #3 Result this OTO coaching/service gives your audience?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: I'll help you convert your ad ideas into working ads on Facebook and Google AdWords; We will figure out exactly which funnels will get you the most sales; We will optimize your Kindle books for maximum sales

fields.fieldTitle: #4 Result this OTO coaching/service gives your audience?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: I'll help you instantly produce customized, professional-level ads to sell anything!; We will track every aspect of your funnel to increase your sales conversions fast!; We will create money-making offer pages inside your book to drive traffic to your website

fields.fieldTitle: #5 Result this OTO coaching/service gives your audience?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: I'll help you create powerful ad copy to sell your own products, clients' products, affiliate offers, and more!; We will use social media sites like Facebook, LinkedIn and Instagram to get more people into your funnels; We will create descriptions for your book using proven sales copy that virtually forces people to click the BUY button on Amazon

fields.fieldTitle: What is the first bonus you're giving them to sweeten the offer?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: My entire Ad Secrets Training Course; My Million Dollar Funnel; We will create a Killer Kindle Cover

fields.fieldTitle: What is the value of that first bonus?
What is the 2nd bonus you're giving them to sweeten the offer?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: 12 Custom Ad Templates; My Dirty Dozen Best Funnel Templates; 30 Minute Cover Consultation and Planning Session

fields.fieldTitle: What is the value of that 2nd bonus?
What is the 3rd bonus you're giving them to sweeten the offer?

fieldHint.hint1: Ex: 5 Ad Review Certificates; Google AdWords Friendly Funnel Templates; Email Blast To My List - I'll tell my list of 100,000 subscribers about each new book you publish!
